flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Son corps est fait de magma.nS’il cesse de bouger, il refroiditnet durcit.
Its body is made of magma.nIf it doesn’t keep moving, itsnbody will cool and harden.
Its body is made of magma.nIf it doesn’t keep moving, itsnbody will cool and harden.
Its body is made of magma.nIf it doesn’t keep moving, itsnbody will cool and harden.
Its body is made of magma.nIf it doesn’t keep moving, itsnbody will cool and harden.
It never sleeps.nIt has to keepnmoving because iffit stopped, itsnmagma body wouldncool and harden.
A common sight innvolcanic areas, itnslowly slithersfaround in a con­nstant search fornwarm places.
These group to­ngether in areasnthat are hotterfthan normal. If itncools off, itsnskin hardens.
Molten magma courses throughoutnSLUGMA’s circulatory system.nIf this POKéMON is chilled, the magmafcools and hardens. Its body turnsnbrittle and chunks fall off, reducingnits size.
SLUGMA does not have any blood in itsnbody. Instead, intensely hot magmancirculates throughout this POKéMON’sfbody, carrying essential nutrients andnoxygen to its organs.
It is a species of POKéMON that lives innvolcanic areas. If its body cools, its skinnhardens and immobilizes it. To avoid that,nit sleeps near magma.
A common sight in volcanic areas, itnslowly slithers around in a constantnsearch for warm places.
It never sleeps. It has to keep movingnbecause if it stopped, its magma bodynwould cool and harden.
Its body is made of magma.nIf it doesn’t keep moving, itsnbody will cool and harden.
Its body is made of magma.nIf it doesn’t keep moving, itsnbody will cool and harden.
Its body is made of magma.nIf it doesn’t keep moving, itsnbody will cool and harden.
It never sleeps. It has to keepnmoving because if it stopped, itsnmagma body would cool and harden.
A common sight in volcanic areas, itnslowly slithers around in anconstant search for warm places.
Son corps est fait de magma.nS’il cesse de bouger, il refroiditnet durcit.
かざんちたいに　おおく　はっせい。nあたたかい　ところを　さがしてnのろのろ　はいずりまわっている。
화산 지대에 많이 나타난다.n따뜻한 곳을 찾아서n느릿느릿 기어 다니고 있다.
Commun dans les régions volcaniques, il se déplacensans cesse pour trouver des endroits chauds.
Es hält sich ständig bei Vulkanen auf und istnstets kriechend auf der Suche nach warmennAufenthaltsorten.
Asiduo a las zonas volcánicas, se desliza lentamentenen busca de lugares calientes.
Comune nelle aree vulcaniche, striscia in gironlentamente, sempre alla ricerca di luoghi caldi.
A common sight in volcanic areas, it slowly slithersnaround in a constant search for warm places.
火山地帯に　多く　発生。n暖かい　ところを　探してnのろのろ　はいずり回っている。
ようがんで　できた　からだを　もつ。nたえず　うごいていないと　からだがnひえて　かたまってしまうのだ。
용암으로 된 몸을 가지고 있다.n끊임없이 움직이지 않으면 몸이n식어 굳어져 버린다.
Son corps est fait de magma. S’il cesse de bouger,nil refroidit et durcit.
Sein Körper besteht aus Magma. Bleibt es nichtnständig in Bewegung, kühlt es aus und verhärtet sich.
Su cuerpo se compone de magma. Si deja denmoverse, se enfría y se endurece.
Nel suo corpo scorre magma. Se non si muovencontinuamente, il suo corpo si raffredda e s’indurisce.
Its body is made of magma. If it doesn’t keepnmoving, its body will cool and harden.
溶岩で　できた　体を　持つ。n絶えず　動いていないと　体がn冷えて　固まってしまうのだ。
からだの　なかでは　しゃくねつの　ようがんがnうずまいているが　ひえると　かたまって　しまいnくずれて　からだが　ちいさく　なっていく。
몸 안에는 작열하는 용암이n소용돌이치지만 식으면 굳어지고n부서져서 몸이 작아진다.
Du magma en fusion coule dans les veines de Limagma.nSi ce Pokémon est refroidi, le magma se solidifie. Son corpsndevient alors cassant et des morceaux s’en détachent,ndiminuant ainsi sa taille.
Durch Schneckmags Kreislaufsystem fließt Magma.nWenn dieses Pokémon erkältet ist, kühlt das Magmanaus und erhärtet. Sein Körper wird spröde und esnbrechen Stücke heraus, sodass es kleiner wird.

Por el sistema circulatorio de Slugma corre magma líquido. Sineste Pokémon se enfriara, el magma perdería el calor y sensolidificaría, por lo que se resquebrajaría por completo,nperdería algunos trozos y reduciría su tamaño.
Nel corpo di Slugma scorre magma liquido. In caso dincongelamento, il magma si raffredda e si solidifica. Il corpondiventa fragile e cade a pezzi consumandosi progressivamente.
Molten magma courses throughout Slugma’s circulatorynsystem. If this Pokémon is chilled, the magma cools andnhardens. Its body turns brittle and chunks fall off, reducingnits size.
体の　中では　灼熱の　溶岩がn渦巻いているが　冷えると　固まって　しまいn崩れて　体が　小さく　なっていく。
からだの　なかでは　けつえきの　かわりにnひつような　えいようと　さんそを　はこぶためにnしゃくねつの　マグマが　じゅんかんしている。
몸 안에는 혈액 대신n필요한 영양과 산소를 운반하기 위해n작열하는 마그마가 순환되고 있다.
Les veines de Limagma ne contiennent pas de sang.nAu lieu de ça, du magma en fusion circule dans le corpsnde ce Pokémon, apportant les nutriments et l’oxygènennécessaires à ses organes.
Schneckmag hat kein Blut in seinem Körper. Stattdessen fließtnglühend heißes Magma in diesem Pokémon, das seine Organenmit lebenswichtigen Nährstoffen und Sauerstoff versorgt.
Slugma no tiene sangre en su organismo, sino ardientenmagma que hace circular por todo el cuerpo los nutrientesny el oxígeno que necesitan sus órganos.
Nel corpo di Slugma non scorre nemmeno una goccia dinsangue, bensì magma rovente, che garantisce l’apporto dinossigeno e sostanze nutritive fondamentali per i suoi organi.
Slugma does not have any blood in its body. Instead, intenselynhot magma circulates throughout this Pokémon’s body,ncarrying essential nutrients and oxygen to its organs.
体の　中では　血液の　かわりにn必要な　栄養と　酸素を　運ぶためにn灼熱の　マグマが　循環している。
